BLAST could be the most-known tool. The detailed instruction can be found [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK52640/ here]. 
The BLAST-based gio tools will use the [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK52640/#_chapter1_Configuration_ configuration] for 
BLAST to carry out the analyses. Please make sure that the *.ncbirc* file points to the BLAST database folder and the PATH environment 
variable includes the folder for the BLAST executable. The BLAST databases can either be directly 
[http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK52640/#_chapter1__Basic_use_1_ downloaded] or created by the *makeblastdb* command.
